extendedInfo.description: How good are you at getting an exact quantity in a jug? Cool Water Jug is simple yet very addictive puzzle Game (FREE)!! One of the most played game on the web is now available for your Android phone!!A mind boggling puzzle game based on the classic water jug puzzle. With its easy, but truly addictive rules, the game will make you feel puzzled and will entertain you a lot with 6 challenging levels! Better than most water games with nice graphics and gameplay.How to Play:Level 1 :You have two jugs. One jug has capacity 5 litres and the other jug has a capacity of 3 litres. You have a unlimited supply of water from the beautiful Well. For help one more well is provided where you can only drain extra water.What you have to do ??Your task is to pour out exactly 4 litres of water in big jug using two jugs and two Wells.Drag the jugs to empty or fill them.In an attempt of filling or emptying each jug you get a game in which every move counts. To check your efficiency of solving the water puzzle you will be shown your move count and the expected move count in the end of the game.As level changes you have to pour different litres of water in big jug whose capacity also changes respectively, like in level 1 you have to pour 4 liters, in 3rd level you have to pour 8 litres and so on.Do you think you can complete all the levels in the minimum number of moves? Try it for yourself! If you like water game, thinking games, water logic, jugs problem, underwater games, puzzles and Mazes which have loads of Challenges and fun then you must try this out!Features:1. A very simple and classic yet addicting user interface.2. 6 unique and challenging Levels (ALL FREE)4. Engaging HD graphics, animations and great voice-overs.5. Develops concentration and focus6. No language barrier â can be played and understood by entire world.7. Easy best time and move count tracking8. Hours to enjoy for FREE!!If you are bored of normal hit games like angry birds, wheres my water, where's my perry, solitare or cut the rope then try this new web game concept in Android and have lot fun !!Water Jug Fun Puzzle Game is a unique and beautifully designed logic puzzle game and it will keep you mesmerized for hours by a continuous increase of difficulty.Enjoy this app and have loads of fun!The application has been tested extensively on various models of Samsung galaxy ace, Sony Xperia, HTC One V. The game is also designed for tablets and Samsung galaxy Note.The appplication works perfect on all mobiles and gives you a thrilling experience on tablets. No internet connectivity is required to play this game.If you like our app, share it with your friends and family through facebook, twitter, googleplus, pinterest. Stay tuned with us as very soon we will be releasing more funny apps like honey bee war game, powerful peeing kid, luck, friend, love, health and marriage scanner & many more exciting apps based on very interesting concepts.We hope you enjoy this fun Android application!!Tags : Android games, free, android apps, water games, addicting games, water jug game, puzzle game, Jugs Problem, Puzzle Water, Water Pouring, Pour the jug.

reviews.title: Simple but Good
reviews.comment: Love this simple yet addictive game, esp when come to solve difficult jug puzzle. It does need some skill and smart brain. Great Job!!
reviews.author: A Google User
